title: So the Duchess Disappeared - Novel Updates
tags: Aristocracy   Arranged Marriage   Beautiful Female Lead   Caring Protagonist   Charming Protagonist   Complex Family Relationships   Contracts   Cunning Protagonist   Devoted Love Interests   Doting Love Interests   European Ambience   Family   Female Protagonist   Forced into a Relationship   Forced Living Arrangements   Handsome Male Lead   Heartwarming   Honest Protagonist   Kind Love Interests   Marriage   Misunderstandings   Pregnancy   Strong Love Interests   Weak to Strong   Wealthy Characters
author: Cat and Rabbit   고양이토끼
description:
On the condition that I give birth to an heir, I made a contract marriage with the Duke.

And I finally got pregnant. I thought I would be guaranteed a comfortable life now.

But I wasn’t.

*

“That woman must be killed when the baby is born.”

I faced the unbelievable truth.

The Duke only wanted an heir.

So, I ran away from the Duke’s mansion with the baby in my belly.>
